title: The Murphy Five and the Guardian in the Woods
description: Dustin's hands were over his ears to muffle the sound of the alarm going off. He was looking down to avoid the strobe lights. Mom rushed to him and grabbed him by the hand. 'Dustin!' she cried, yanking him off the floor. 'There's a fire! We've got to get outta here!' When the Murphy family moves from the big city to the country, Mr. and Mrs. Murphy hope for a better life for their children. The Murphy Five and the Guardian in the Woods is a novel from author Peri Weaks, highlighting the fun and frivolity of the Murphy childrenJustin, Alexa, April, Brandon, and Dustin. Living nearby a large luxury resort built as a family vacation and business meeting destination, the kids have lots of adventures while discovering what it really means to be a family. The five Murphy kids quickly get into one scrape after another, and when they find themselves in the scariest situation of all, they learn that they have a guardian watching over them.
author: Peri Weaks
